FilterItemPortable.Name: Empresa
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="EMPRESA"> <FieldDefinitionName>AssociationFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <Properties>A.HANDLE IN(SELECT P.EMPRESA FROM GN_PARAMETROS P WHERE P.CONTROLEDOCUMENTOSFORNECEDORES IN (2,3))</Properties> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
